Producer: Will Smith, Steve Tisch, Todd Black, James Lassiter, Jason Blumenthal
Rating: PG-13 (Some Disturbing Content|A Scene of Sensuality|Thematic Material)
Synopsis: A life-shattering secret torments Ben Thomas (Will Smith). In order to find redemption, he sets out to change the lives of seven strangers. Over the course of his journey, he meets and falls in love with a cardiac patient named Emily (Rosario Dawson), and in so doing, complicates his mission.
Title: Seven Pounds
